tool_description: This api allows developers to interact with bospasa content for creating or integrating their own applications
name: Bospasa
title: Bospasa

api_list.name: Get Client
api_list.description: This method retrieves a client that will be used to represent the user. If the user is not already logged in a new client is created. NOTE: when a new client is issued, please make sure you store the client_secret as it is ONLY supplied at the point of creation.

optional_parameters.name: new_client
optional_parameters.description: If this parameter is set to true, it will force the creation for a new client. Creation of a new client will require your users to re-authorize your application.

api_list.name: Get Booking
api_list.description: This gets the details of a booking

api_list.name: Get Cities
Get Currency List

optional_parameters.name: currency
optional_parameters.description: 3 Character currency code. if not set, a list of all currencies will be returned

api_list.name: /oauth/token?code={authorization-code}
api_list.description: This retrieves an access token and refresh token for the client to use when making calls. Please make sure you store these so you don't have to keep having your clients reauthorize your application.

optional_parameters.name: client_secret
optional_parameters.description: This is the client secret provided when the client was created.

optional_parameters.name: grant_type
optional_parameters.description: This is the type of authorization that your client expects to get back

api_list.name: Authorize Client
api_list.description: This endpoint logs in and authorize a user client against the application. This basically allows you to make calls on behalf of the user. If the client has previously been authorized, you can skip this step.

required_parameters.name: client_id
required_parameters.description: The client ID provided to you in the clients/get_client method.

required_parameters.name: response_type
required_parameters.description: the type of authorization response the bospasa authorization process will provide
